Title: Home Sweet Homeless Shelter
Writer: John Wells (developed for American television by), Paul Abbott (created by), Krista Vernoff, Dominique Morisseau (executive story editor)
Actors: William H. Macy, Emmy Rossum, Jeremy Allen White, Ethan Cutkosky
Plot: Kevin, Veronica and Svetlana start a topless maid service; Frank makes new friends at the shelter to replace his family; Debbie's new lifestyle comes to an abrupt end; Carl gets a gonorrhea...
